titleStmt.title: To the right reverend, the moderator, and remanent members of the venerable assembly of the Church of Scotland, now sitting at Edinburgh. The humble representation of Walter Earl of Tarras, and the other heretors concerned, for re-erecting the Kirk of Robertoun
titleStmt.author: Tarras, Walter Scott, Earl of, 1644-1693.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
